result.eng: Could you call Bríd?

result.orig: An dtiocfadh leat glaoch a chur ar Bhríd

result.eng: Do the books have to be printed in Ireland?
result.ga: An gá na leabhair a chur i gcló in Éirinn
result.orig: An gá na leabhair a chur i gcló in Éirinn
result.html: An gá na leabhair a chur i gcló in ÉirinnDo the books have to be printed in Ireland?
result.ponchtml: An gá na leaḃair a ċur i gcló in ÉirinnDo the books have to be printed in Ireland?

result.eng: At first, I would like to welcome everybody.
result.ga: Ar dtús ba mhaith liom fáilte a chur roimh gach éinne
result.orig: Ar dtús ba mhaith liom fáilte a chur roimh gach éinne
result.html: Ar dtús ba mhaith liom fáilte a chur roimh gach éinneAt first, I would like to welcome everybody.
result.ponchtml: Ar dtús ba ṁaiṫ liom fáilte a ċur roiṁ gaċ éinneAt first, I would like to welcome everybody.

result.eng: You might want to improve the design.
result.ga: B'fhiú dhuit feabhas a chur ar an dearadh
result.orig: B'fhiú dhuit feabhas a chur ar an dearadh
result.html: B'fhiú dhuit feabhas a chur ar an dearadhYou might want to improve the design.
result.ponchtml: B'ḟiú ḋuit feaḃas a ċur ar an dearaḋYou might want to improve the design.

result.eng: I would like to interview you.
result.ga: Ba mhaith liom agallamh a chur ort
result.orig: Ba mhaith liom agallamh a chur ort
result.html: Ba mhaith liom agallamh a chur ortI would like to interview you.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁaiṫ liom agallaṁ a ċur ortI would like to interview you.

result.eng: I would like to welcome you to Ireland.
result.ga: Ba mhaith liom fáilte a chur romhaibh go hÉirinn
result.orig: Ba mhaith liom fáilte a chur romhaibh go hÉirinn
result.html: Ba mhaith liom fáilte a chur romhaibh go hÉirinnI would like to welcome you to Ireland.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁaiṫ liom fáilte a ċur roṁaiḃ go hÉirinnI would like to welcome you to Ireland.

result.eng: I would like to introduce myself to them.
result.ga: Ba mhaith liom mé féin a chur in aithne dóibh
result.orig: Ba mhaith liom mé féin a chur in aithne dóibh
result.html: Ba mhaith liom mé féin a chur in aithne dóibhI would like to introduce myself to them.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁaiṫ liom mé féin a ċur in aiṫne dóiḃI would like to introduce myself to them.

result.eng: I would like to introduce you to the President.
result.ga: Ba mhaith liom tú a chur in aithne don Uachtarán
result.orig: Ba mhaith liom tú a chur in aithne don Uachtarán
result.html: Ba mhaith liom tú a chur in aithne don UachtaránI would like to introduce you to the President.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁaiṫ liom tú a ċur in aiṫne don UaċtaránI would like to introduce you to the President.

result.eng: I was going to phone you.
result.ga: Bhí mé chun glaoch a chur ort
result.orig: Bhí mé chun glaoch a chur ort
result.html: Bhí mé chun glaoch a chur ortI was going to phone you.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ċun glaoċ a ċur ortI was going to phone you.

result.eng: I had to end that madness.
result.ga: Bhí orm deireadh a chur leis an amaidí sin
result.orig: Bhí orm deireadh a chur leis an amaidí sin
result.html: Bhí orm deireadh a chur leis an amaidí sinI had to end that madness.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí orm deireaḋ a ċur leis an amaidí sinI had to end that madness.

result.eng: I had to use all my strength.
result.ga: Bhí orm iomlán mo nirt a chur in úsáid
result.orig: Bhí orm iomlán mo nirt a chur in úsáid
result.html: Bhí orm iomlán mo nirt a chur in úsáidI had to use all my strength.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí orm iomlán mo nirt a ċur in úsáidI had to use all my strength.

result.eng: The company promotes certain products on the Irish market.
result.ga: Déanann an comhlacht táirgí áirithe a chur chun cinn ar mhargadh na hÉireann
result.orig: Déanann an comhlacht táirgí áirithe a chur chun cinn ar mhargadh na hÉireann

result.ponchtml: Déanann an coṁlaċt táirgí áiriṫe a ċur ċun cinn ar ṁargaḋ na hÉireannThe company promotes certain products on the Irish market.

result.eng: Thanks for reminding me that.
result.ga: Go raibh maith agat as é sin a chur i gcuimhne dom
result.orig: Go raibh maith agat as é sin a chur i gcuimhne dom
result.html: Go raibh maith agat as é sin a chur i gcuimhne domThanks for reminding me that.
result.ponchtml: Go raiḃ maiṫ agat as é sin a ċur i gcuiṁne domThanks for reminding me that.

result.eng: You can bet on it.
result.ga: Is féidir leat geall a chur air
result.orig: Is féidir leat geall a chur air
result.html: Is féidir leat geall a chur airYou can bet on it.
result.ponchtml: Is féidir leat geall a ċur airYou can bet on it.

result.eng: It is not appropriate for the police to ask me such questions.
result.ga: Ní cóir do na póilíní ceisteanna mar seo a chur orm
result.orig: Ní cóir do na póilíní ceisteanna mar seo a chur orm
result.html: Ní cóir do na póilíní ceisteanna mar seo a chur ormIt is not appropriate for the police to ask me such questions.
result.ponchtml: Ní cóir do na póilíní ceisteanna mar seo a ċur ormIt is not appropriate for the police to ask me such questions.

result.eng: The door must be locked every night.
result.ga: Ní mór an doras a chur faoi ghlas gach oíche
result.orig: Ní mór an doras a chur faoi ghlas gach oíche
result.html: Ní mór an doras a chur faoi ghlas gach oícheThe door must be locked every night.
result.ponchtml: Ní mór an doras a ċur faoi ġlas gaċ oíċeThe door must be locked every night.

result.eng: I forgot to call you.
result.ga: Rinne mé dearmad glaoch a chur ort
result.orig: Rinne mé dearmad glaoch a chur ort
result.html: Rinne mé dearmad glaoch a chur ortI forgot to call you.
result.ponchtml: Rinne mé dearmad glaoċ a ċur ortI forgot to call you.

result.eng: They tried promoting the use of Irish among young people.
result.ga: Rinne siad iarracht úsáid na Gaeilge a chur chun cinn i measc daoine óga
result.orig: Rinne siad iarracht úsáid na Gaeilge a chur chun cinn i measc daoine óga

result.ponchtml: Rinne siad iarraċt úsáid na Gaeilge a ċur ċun cinn i measc daoine ógaThey tried promoting the use of Irish among young people.

result.eng: To present the research results to the public.
result.ga: Torthaí na taighde a chur i láthair an phobail
result.orig: Torthaí na taighde a chur i láthair an phobail
result.html: Torthaí na taighde a chur i láthair an phobailTo present the research results to the public.
result.ponchtml: Torṫaí na taiġde a ċur i láṫair an ṗobailTo present the research results to the public.

result.eng: I'm sorry to put pressure on you.
result.ga: Tá brón orm as brú a chur ort
result.orig: Tá brón orm as brú a chur ort
result.html: Tá brón orm as brú a chur ortI'm sorry to put pressure on you.
result.ponchtml: Tá brón orm as brú a ċur ortI'm sorry to put pressure on you.

result.eng: I wouldn't like to put you under too much pressure.
result.ga: Níor mhaith liom an iomarca brú a chur ort
result.orig: Níor mhaith liom an iomarca brú a chur ort
result.html: Níor mhaith liom an iomarca brú a chur ortI wouldn't like to put you under too much pressure.

result.eng: Now, I'd like to ask you a couple more questions about pastimes.
result.ga: Anois ba mhaith liom cúpla ceist eile a chur ort faoi chaitheamh aimsire

result.eng: They had a chance to showcase their storytelling talents to the public.
result.ga: Bhí deis acu a gcuid buanna scéalaíochta a chur os comhair an phobail

result.eng: She has a talent for asking clever questions.
result.ga: Tá sé de bhua aici ceisteanna cliste a chur
result.orig: Tá sé de bhua aici ceisteanna cliste a chur
result.html: Tá sé de bhua aici ceisteanna cliste a churShe has a talent for asking clever questions.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé de ḃua aici ceisteanna cliste a ċurShe has a talent for asking clever questions.

result.eng: There are three letters at the end of each file name to indicate what type of file it is.
result.ga: Bíonn trí litir ag deireadh ainm gach comhaid chun a chur in iúl cén cineál comhaid atá ann

result.eng: The company should have notified us of this this six months ago.

result.eng: It was foolish of me to ask that question.
result.ga: B'amaideach an mhaise domsa an cheist a chur
result.orig: B'amaideach an mhaise domsa an cheist a chur
result.html: B'amaideach an mhaise domsa an cheist a churIt was foolish of me to ask that question.
result.ponchtml: B'amaideaċ an ṁaise domsa an ċeist a ċurIt was foolish of me to ask that question.

result.eng: You will see bushes with thorns. If you manage to negotiate those throny bushes, you will have succeeded.
result.ga: Feicfidh sibh sceacha a bhfuil deilgne orthu Má éiríonn libh na sceacha deilgneacha a chur díbh beidh an lá libh
result.orig: Feicfidh sibh sceacha a bhfuil deilgne orthu Má éiríonn libh na sceacha deilgneacha a chur díbh beidh an lá libh
result.html: Feicfidh sibh sceacha a bhfuil deilgne orthu Má éiríonn libh na sceacha deilgneacha a chur díbh beidh an lá libhYou will see bushes with thorns. If you manage to negotiate those throny bushes, you will have succeeded.
result.ponchtml: Feicfiḋ siḃ sceaċa a ḃfuil deilgne orṫu Má éiríonn liḃ na sceaċa deilgneaċa a ċur díḃ beiḋ an lá liḃYou will see bushes with thorns. If you manage to negotiate those throny bushes, you will have succeeded.

result.eng: Workers were needed to clear the land and to plant, harvest and carry the crops.
result.ga: Bhí gá le hoibrithe chun an talamh a ghlanadh agus na bairr a chur a bhaint agus a iompar

result.ponchtml: Ḃí gá le hoibriṫe ċun an talaṁ a ġlanaḋ agus na bairr a ċur a ḃaint agus a iomparWorkers were needed to clear the land and to plant, harvest and carry the crops.

result.eng: You could have gotten rid of him a little more kindly than you did.
result.ga: Thiocfadh leat a chur díot rud beag ní ba síodúla ná mar a rinne tú

result.ponchtml: Ṫiocfaḋ leat a ċur díot rud beag ní ba síodúla ná mar a rinne túYou could have gotten rid of him a little more kindly than you did.

result.eng: That's what they say about him, be it true or false.
result.ga: Táthar á chur sin air cibé acu fíor bréag an scéal
result.orig: Táthar á chur sin air cibé acu fíor bréag an scéal
